params.ownerIdentityId: Id of the identity of the owner of the SBT
params.readerIdentityId: Id of the identity of the reader
params.signature: Signature of the read link request made by the owner

disablePaymentMethod(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

enablePaymentMethod(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

getEnabledPaymentMethods().details: Returns the address of all available payment methods

returns._0: Array of all enabled payment methods

params.readerIdentityId: Id of the identity of the reader of the SBT
Id of the identity of the reader of the SBT

params.paymentMethod: Address of token that user want to pay
params.token: Token that user want to store link

returns._0: Current price for storing a link

params.owner: Address of the owner of the identity

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeLink(uint256,uint256,address,uint2.details: The token must be linked to this soul linker

params.ownerIdentityId: Id of the identity of the owner of the SBT
params.readerIdentityId: Id of the identity of the reader

setMasaToken(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function It can be set to address(0) to disable paying in MASA

params._masaToken: New utility token to pay the fee in

setReserveWallet(address).details: Let change the reserve walled. It can be triggered by an authorized account.

setSoulboundIdentity(address).details: The caller must be the owner to call this function

setStableCoin(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

params._stableCoin: New stable coin to pay the fee in

setSwapRouter(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

setWrappedNativeToken(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

params.ownerIdentityId: Id of the identity of the owner of the SBT
params.readerIdentityId: Id of the identity of the reader

returns._0: True if the link is valid

addLink(address,uint256,uint256,address,.notice: Stores the link, validating the signature of the given read link request

disablePaymentMethod(address).notice: Removes a token as a valid payment method

enablePaymentMethod(address).notice: Adds a new token as a valid payment method

getIdentityId(address,uint256).notice: Returns the identityId owned by the given token

getLinkInfo(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Returns the information of link dates for a given SBT token and reader

getLinkSignatureDates(address,uint256,ui.notice: Returns the list of link signature dates for a given SBT token and reader

getLinks(address,uint256).notice: Returns the list of link signature dates for a given SBT token and reader

getPriceForAddLink(address,address).notice: Returns the price for storing a link

getSBTConnections(address,address).notice: Returns the list of connected SBTs by a given SBT token

getSBTConnections(uint256,address).notice: Returns the list of connected SBTs by a given SBT token

setMasaToken(address).notice: Sets the utility token to pay the fee in (MASA)

setSoulboundIdentity(address).notice: Sets the SoulboundIdentity contract address linked to this soul name

setStableCoin(address).notice: Sets the stable coin to pay the fee in (USDC)

setWrappedNativeToken(address).notice: Sets the wrapped native token address

validateLink(uint256,uint256,address,uin.notice: Validates the link of the given read link request and returns the data that reader can read if the link is valid

userdoc.notice: Soul linker smart contract that let add links to a Soulbound token.

t_mapping(t_address,t_mapping(t_uint256,.label: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct SoulLinker.LinkData))))
